home.explore: You can explore, learn everything and download assets to use our brand.
home.whatIsThis.paragraph1: This guideline is for internal use and aims to support VTEX brand management and usage in all of it's contexts, surfaces, devices and manifestations.
home.whatIsThis.paragraph2: The following content is the main reference to communication, design and marketing professionals, as well as everyone with the intention to use our brand. Use this as a toolset to develop strategies and create materials for the brand, the company and it's products while keeping it's authenticity and visual coherence.
